definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: fall, lie (NH = BH, Targum [[נְפַל]], Syr. npal; cf. also Ar. nafala dedit praedam (Nö:ZMG xl (1886), 725 Frä:153 f.), Min. [[נפל]] remove Hom:Sudar. Chrest. 128);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: :366 Pf. ´[[נ]] Ju Jdg 5:27 +, 3 fs. [[נׇֽפְלָה]] Ge 15:12 +, etc.; Impf. [[יִפּׂל]] 1Sa 14:45 +, [[וַיִּפּׂל]] Ju Jdg 4:16 +; 1 S. [[אֶפּׂל]] 1Ch 21:13 (needless change fr. 1 pl. [[נִפְּלָה]] ‖ 2Sa 24:14 We Dr); 3 mpl. [[יִפְּלוּ]] Ho 7:16 +, [[יִפָּׂלוּ]] Is 3:25 +, 3 fpl. [[תִּפּׂ֫לְנׇה]] Ez Eze 13:11, Eze 30:25, etc.; Imv. mpl. [[נִפְלוּ]] Ho 10:8, Je 25:27; Inf. abs. [[נׇפוֹל]] Es 6:13; cstr. [[נְפׂל]] Is 30:25 +; [[לִנְפּׂל]] Je 51:49 +; sf. [[נׇפְלוֹ]] 1Sa 29:3, [[נִפְלוֹ]] 2Sa 1:10, [[נִפְלָם]] Je 49:21 (on these forms cf. Ba:NB 104); Pt. [[נׁפֵל]] Ju Jdg 4:22 +; f. [[נׁפֶ֫לֶת]] Ge 15:12 +; pl. [[נׁפְלִים]] Jos 8:25 + (ins. also 1Sa 28:19 b LXX Th We Dr Kit Bu HPS; Klo [[כּׂרְעִים]]), etc.;—

fall, by accident, [[־שָׁ֫מָּה]]´[[וְנ]] Ex 21:33 (E) and there fall into it (a pit) an ox or an ass, cf. De 22:4 ([[בַּדֶּרֶח]], on the way), bird [[עַל־פַּח]] Am 3:5; subj. pers., 1Sa 4:18 (fr. seat, [[מֵעַל]]), De 22:8, De 22:8 (fr. roof, [[מִן]]); oft. into ([[ב]]) pit (usu. fig.) Pr 26:27, Pr 28:10, also (abs.), Pr 22:14, Ec 10:8, Ps 7:16, Ps 57:7 ([[בְּתוֹח]]), cf. Ps 35:8, Ps 141:10 (net), also, c. [[אֶל]], Is 24:18 = Je 48:44; fall [[בְּלֵב יַמִּים]] Ez Eze 27:27 (of Tyrian people); abs. 2Sa 4:4, Gn 14:10, Je 25:27; opp. [[קוּם]] Je 8:4 cf. Ec 4:10, Ec 4:10; c. [[אָחוֹר]] fall backward Ge 49:17 (poem); c. [[בְּעַד]] through 2Ki 1:2 cf. (of locusts) Joe 2:8; † [[עַל־חֶרֶב]] ´[[נ]] causing death 1Sa 31:4, 1Sa 31:5 = 1Ch 10:4, 1Ch 10:5; † [[עַל־פָּנׇיו אַ֫רְחָה]] ´[[נ]] 1Sa 17:49 (Goliath); subj. rei, 2Ki 2:13, 2Ki 2:14 ([[מֵעַל]]), 2Ki 6:5 ([[אֶל־]] into water), v:2Ki 6:6 (abs.); c. [[עַל]] Le 11:32, Le 11:35, Le 11:37, Le 11:38, [[אֶל־]] v:Le 11:33; abs. of tent Ju Jdg 7:13 + v:Jdg 7:13 (gloss, GFM, Bu); of wall Jos 6:5 (JE), Je 51:44, fig. Ez Eze 13:11 (del. LXX SyrVer Sm Co Berthol), v:Eze 13:12; v:Eze 13:14, [[לְאֶרֶץ]] Ez Eze 38:20; + [[תַּחְתֶּיהָ]] i.e. flat Jos 6:20; ´[[נ]] of bricks Is 9:9 (in fig.), [[פֶּרֶץ]] Is 30:13, towes v:Is 30:25, foundations Je 50:15; wall fell upon ([[על]]) 1Ki 20:30, so of house Ju Jdg 16:30, Job 1:19, mts. Ho 10:8; mt. also abs. Job 14:18 (cf. [[נׇבֵל]]), height Ez Eze 38:20; tree Ec 11:3, Ec 11:3 ([[ב]] loc.), cf. Is 10:34 ([[בְ]] instr., in fig.), Zec 11:2 (abs.); branches Ez Eze 31:12 (fig.); a grain Am 9:9 ([[אֶרֶץ]] = to earth); of dew 2Sa 17:12 (c. [[על]]), hailstones Ez Eze 13:11; blood ([[אַ֫רְחָה]]) 1Sa 26:20; † hair of head ([[ארחה]]) 1Sa 14:45, 2Sa 14:11, 1Ki 1:52; horns of altar Am 3:14 ([[לָאָרֶץ]]); peg Is 22:25; fruit [[עַל־פֶּה]] Na 3:12; crown La 5:16; arm from ([[מִן]]) shoulder Job 31:22; of sword (appar.) 2Sa 20:8 (but on text v. Comm.); † fire from heaven, abs. 1Ki 18:38 c. [[מִן]] Job 1:16 †; † hand of ´[[י]] Ez Eze 8:1 (c. [[עַל־]]; but rd. [[וַתְּהִי]] LXX Co Berthol); spirit of ´[[י]] Ez Eze 11:5 ([[עַל־]]); of lot ([[גּוֹרָל]]) Ez Eze 24:6, Jon 1:7 (both c. [[עַל]]), 1Ch 26:14 (c. [[לְ]]; ‖[[יׇחָא]]), + Es 3:7 LXX Ry Wild ([[עַל]]); cf.

definitions.title: Hiph. 3
definitions.body: ; hence (of share, inheritance) fall, be allotted, to ([[לְ]]) Ju Jdg 18:1 ([[ב]] = as: [[בְּ]]

definitions.title: 17 c
definitions.body: ; so Nu 34:2, Ez Eze 47:14), Ps 16:6, abs. Jos 17:5.—On Ez Eze 47:22 b v.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: fig. = go to ruin, perish, etc. (c. 30 t.); Am 5:2, Am 8:14 +; oft. ‖[[כָּשַׁל]] Is 3:8, Is 8:15 (+ other words), Is 31:3, Je 8:12, Je 46:12, Je 50:32, Ps 27:2, Pr 24:17; ‖[[כָּרַע]] Ps 20:9; fig. of earth Is 24:20 (opp. [[קוּם]]), Haman falls before ([[לִפְנֵי]]) Mordecai Es 6:13, Es 6:13; cf. Is 14:12 (abs.); peculiar to Pr are [[בְּרִשְׁעָה]] ´[[נ]] Pr 11:5, [[בְּרַע]] Pr 13:17, [[בְּרָעָה]] Pr 17:20, Pr 28:14.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: fig. = experience calamity Mic 7:8 (opp. [[קוּם]]), Ps 37:34, Ps 145:14, Pr 24:16.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: fall, of a city Je 51:8 (‖[[וַתִּשָּׁבֵר]]).

definitions.title: 3. a.
definitions.body: Fall prostrate, Ju Jdg 19:26, Jdg 19:27, + [[אַ֫רְחָה]] Job 1:20; fall at full length (in a faint) [[וַיִּפּׂל מְלאׁ־]] [[קוֹמָתוֹ]] 1Sa 28:20; sink down Nu 24:4, Nu 24:16 (JE; supernat. influence); of arms of Pharaoh Ez Eze 30:25 (opp. [[חָזַק]]).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: fall = prostrate oneself before ([[לִפְנֵי]]) man Ge 50:18 (E), 2Sa 19:19, Ge 44:14 (J; + [[אַ֫רְחָה]]); before ´[[י]] 2Ch 20:18; [[אֶל־פָּנׇיו אַ֫רְחָה]] ´[[נ]] before ´[[י]] or his representative Jos 5:14, Jos 7:6 (both JE); also ([[ארחה]] om.) Ez Eze 43:3, Eze 44:4; before man 2Sa 14:22; more oft. [[עַל־פָּנׇיו]] ´[[נ]], before man 2Sa 9:6, 1Ki 18:7, 1Ki 18:39, Ru 2:10, before ´[[י]] Ge 17:3, Ge 17:17 + 6 t. P, Ez Eze 3:23, Eze 9:8, Eze 11:13, 1Ch 21:16, Da 8:17; + [[אַ֫רְפָה]], before man 2Sa 14:4, before ´[[י]] Ju Jdg 13:20; [[לְאַפָּיו אַ֫רְחָה]] 1Sa 20:41, [[לְאַפֵּי דָוִד עַל־פָּנֶיהָ]] 1Sa 25:23, [[ארחה]] ´[[נ]] 2Sa 1:2 (all before man); [[עַל־רַגְלָיו]] ´[[נ]] fall at one's feet 1Sa 25:24, 2Ki 4:37, ´[[לִפְנֵי ר]] Es 8:3. Vid. syn. sub [[קדד]].

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: fall upon ([[עַל]]) one's neck, in embrace Ge 33:4, Ge 46:29 (both J), Ge 45:14 (E), [[עַל־פְּנֵי אָבִיו]] Ge 50:1 (J).

definitions.title: 4. a.
definitions.body: Fall upon ([[עַל]]) = attack Je 48:32 (fig.), cf. Is 16:9; c. [[בְּ]] Jos 11:7 (D), abs. Job 1:15; [[אִישׁ אֶל־רֵעֵהוּ]] ´[[נ]] Je 46:16.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: [[בְּיַד]] ´[[נ]] fall into the hand (power) of Ju Jdg 15:18, La 1:7:—cf. also

definitions.title: 2. a.
definitions.body: supr.

† Fig., of deep sleep, c. [[עַל]] Ge 15:12, (J), 1Sa 26:12, Job 4:13, Job 33:15; face, countenance (in displeasure) Ge 4:5, Ge 4:6 (J); [[לֵב אָדָם עָלָיו]] ´[[נ]] 1Sa 17:32 (of sinking heart); [[וַיִּפְּלוּ בְעֵינֵיהֶם]]) Ne 6:16 and they were cast down in their (own) eyes (cf. Be-Ry, Ryle); † of calamity sq. [[עַל־]] Is 47:11 Ec 9:12; terror, etc., sq. [[עַל־]] Ge 15:12 (J), Jos 2:9 (JE), Ex 15:16 (song), 1Sa 11:7, Job 13:11, Ps 55:5, Ps 105:38, Es 8:17, Es 9:2, Es 9:3, Da 10:7; reproach, sq. [[עַל־]] Ps 69:10; † = fail to be accomplished Jos 21:43, Jos 23:14, Jos 23:14 (all D), 1Ki 8:56, 2Ki 10:10 (+ [[אַ֫רְחָה]]); = not to be reckoned Nu 6:12 (P); † of word ([[דָּבָר]]) falling into ([[ב]]) Isr. Is 9:7; † = fall out, turn out, result Ru 3:18 (subj. [[דָּבָר]]).

Other idiomatic uses are: [[לְמִשְׁכָּב]] ´[[נ]] take to one's bed Ex 21:18 (E); settle Ge 25:18 (J); = alight quickly, [[מֵעַל הַגׇּמָל]] Ge 24:64 (J), [[מֵעַל]] [[הַמֶּרְכָּבָה]] 2Ki 5:21; waste away Nu 5:21, Nu 5:22, Nu 5:27; = be born Is 26:18 (cf.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: v:Is 26:19); = be offered, of supplication (´[[לִפְנֵי י]]) Je 36:7, Je 37:20, Je 42:2 (cf.

definitions.title: Hiph. 6
definitions.body: ); c. [[מִן]] = be inferior to Job 12:3, Job 13:2. †

= lie, of Midianites, etc. (like locusts; [[ב]] loc.) Ju Jdg 9:12; = lie prostrate, 1Sa 19:24; usu. pt. Jos 7:10 (JE; [[עַל־פָּנֶיְ]]), 1Sa 5:3, 1Sa 5:4 ([[לְפָנׇיו]]), Am 9:11, [[עַל־הַמִּטָּה]] Es 7:8; of the dead 1Sa 31:8 = 1Ch 10:8, De 21:1, Ez Eze 32:27 (Co conj. [[נְפִילִים]] [cf. Ge 6:4], v. also Berthol Toy:Hpt); [[נׁפֵל אַ֫רְחָה מֵת]] Ju Jdg 3:25 cf. Jdg 4:22 (om. [[ארחה]]); [[אַ֫רְחָה]] ´[[פְּגׇרִים נ]] 2Ch 20:24; cf. also Ez Eze 32:22, Eze 32:23, Eze 32:24 (del. in v:Eze 32:22 Hi Co Berthol, in v:Eze 32:23 Toy:Hpt).
cause to fall, c. acc., lit.:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: fell tree 2Ki 3:19, 2Ki 3:25 cf. 2Ki 6:5.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: throw down wall 2Sa 20:15.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: knock out tooth Ex 21:27 (E).

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: lay prostrate Da 25:2 (for bastinado).

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: cast (cedar pillars) into ([[עַל־]]) fire Je 22:7; so (c. [[ב]]), wicked men Ps 140:11.

definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: make sword drop from ([[מִן]]) hand Ez Eze 30:22 (fig.), cf. Eze 39:3.

definitions.title: g.
definitions.body: cause stone to fall [[עַל]] Nu 35:23, flesh Ps 78:28 ([[בְּקֶרֶב]]), stars Da 8:10 (in vision).

Of causing death [[בַּחֶרֶב]] 2Ki 19:7 = Is 37:7, Je 19:7, Ez Eze 32:12 (all ´[[י]] subj.), 2Ch 32:21 (human subj.); [[בְּיַד]] 1Sa 18:25; + [[חֲלָלִים]] Ez Eze 6:4, Pr 7:26; also Ps 106:26, Da 11:12 = overthrow, bring to destruction, Ps 37:14, Ps 73:18 (c. [[ל]]), Ps 106:27.

Esp. of casting lot ([[גּוֹרָל]]), Is 34:17 (c. [[לְ]] for), Ne 10:35 (c. [[עַל]] + inf.), Ne 11:1 (c. inf.), 1Ch 26:14 (c. [[לְ]]; so rd. Kit:Hpt cf. LXX Vulgate Be Öt), Ps 22:19 (c. [[עַל]]), Es 9:24 (c. inf.); abs. Jon 1:7, Jon 1:7, 1Ch 24:31, 1Ch 25:8, 1Ch 26:13, Es 3:7; + [[בְּתוֹכֵנוּ]] Pr 1:14 (i.e. share with us); om. [[גּוֹרָל]] 1Sa 14:32 (c. [[בֵּין]]), Job 6:27 (c. [[עַל]]); hence ´[[הִפּ]] = assign, apportion, by lot, usu. c. [[לְ]] pers., Jos 13:6, Jos 23:4 (both D), Ez Eze 45:1, Eze 47:22 a = v:Eze 47:22 b (rd. [[יַפִּילוּ]] Vulgate Targum Hi-Sm Co Berthol), Eze 48:29 (read [[בְנַחֲלָה]] for ´[[מנ]] LXX Vulgate Hi-Sm, etc.), Ps 78:55 (cf.

definitions.title: Qal 1
definitions.body: end; and [[בְּ]]
Fig., let drop, cause to fail (cf

Cause deep sleep to fall ([[עַל־]]) Ge 2:21 (J), Pr 19:15 (abs.), make countenance fall, look displeased at ([[ב]]), Je 3:12, cf. Job 29:24 (obj. [[אוֹר פָּנַי]]); cause terror, etc., to fall ([[עַל־]]) Je 15:8.
Other idioms are: bring to life (prop. drop young) Is 26:19 (fig.); present supplication Je 38:26, Je 42:9 Da 9:18, Da 9:20 (all c. [[לִפְנֵי]]);—on both cf.

definitions.title: Hithp.
definitions.body: throw, or prostrate oneself,
Inf. cstr. [[הִתְנַפֵּל]] throw himself upon ([[על]]) Ge 43:18 (J; i.e. attack).
Pf. 1 S. [[הִתְנַפָָּלְתִּי]] De 9:25; Impf. 1 S. [[וׇאֶתְנַפַּל]] De 9:18, De 9:25; Pt. [[מִתְנַפֵּל]] Ezr 10:1; —prostrate oneself and lie prostrate, ´[[לִפְנֵי י]].—

definitions.title: Pilïel.
definitions.body: [[וְנִפְלַל]] Ez Eze 28:23, rd. [[וְנׇפַל]] Hi-Sm Co Berthol.
